thread.title: MOTHER & DAUGHTERS JAYWALK CARELESSLY, DRIVER FORCED TO SWERVE TO AVOID THEM

author: farhan
title: MOTHER & DAUGHTERS JAYWALK CARELESSLY, DRIVER FORCED TO SWERVE TO AVOID THEM
text:
MOTHER & DAUGHTERS JAYWALK CARELESSLY, DRIVER FORCED TO SWERVE TO AVOID THEM   
<Facebook post by Roads.Sg> Advertisement 
Mother and two daughters jaywalking, stepping out onto road carelessly and not paying attention to on-coming traffic. 
Driver was forced to swerve to avoid hitting the woman and two girls. 
Please educate our own family members about road safety and respecting the roads simply because danger is lurking everywhere. 
Be safe, be careful Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
